c74object.name: dada.analysis.rhythmdistrib
c74object.description: Finds the rhythmic energy distribution of a score

outlet.description: Outputs the energy distribution corresponding to each one of the onsets.

objarg.name: numdiv
objarg.description: Sets the number N of equally spaced regions into which will serve as grid for the quantization (the grid will contain hence N+1 onsets, considering the first and last one).

method.name: bang
method.description: Outputs the result of the analysis performed on the most recently received input data.

method.name: llll
method.description: An llll in the first inlet is considered as a bach.roll or bach.score gathered syntax on which the analysis should be performed. The score is divided into N (which is the numdiv attribute) equally spaced regions and each note is then quantized to the nearest one of the N+1 corresponding onsets. Such onsets are output through the second outlet, and then the corresponding energy distribution is output through the left outlet.

attribute.name: numdiv
attribute.description: Sets the number N of equally spaced regions into which will serve as grid for the quantization (the grid will contain hence N+1 onsets, considering the first and last one).

c74object.discussion: The onsets are quantized into N uniformly spaced regions (where N is the numdiv attribute); then the velocities of the corresponding notes are summed, and finally normalized.

entry.name: Outlet 1 (llll)
entry.description: Energy distribution. Outputs the energy distribution corresponding to each one of the onsets.

entry.name: More details
entry.description: The onsets are quantized into N uniformly spaced regions (where N is the numdiv attribute); then the velocities of the corresponding notes are summed, and finally normalized.
